content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.pressGa: You joined a ship's crew because you were press ganged.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.apprent: You joined a ship's crew because your family set up an apprenticeship.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.owedMon: You joined a ship's crew because you owed a lot of money to the wrong people.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.drunken: You joined a ship's crew because you killed a man in a drunken rage.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.fun: You joined a ship's crew because life on the Sea seemed fun.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.born: You joined a ship's crew because you were born on a ship.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.envy.de: You may roll a DR 14 Presence Test to convince someone to give you something you don’t own a version of.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.glutton: The layer of fat covering your body protects you. You are always considered to be wearing tier 1 armor.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.avarice: Whenever you are carrying at least 100s, you may add Presence to any Test.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.lust.de: You may roll a DR 14 Presence Test to convince someone that you really like them. Everyone else reduces the DR of all Tests against that person by -2 as long as you maintain the charade and are within arm’s reach of the person.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.pride.d: Select one item of your items when you awaken each day, it cannot be broken or lost until you choose a new item.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.sloth.d: If you die while neglecting your duties and obligations, you may roll a DR 14 Presence Test to instead fall asleep and awaken with 1d4 HP in 1d4 minutes.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.anger.d: You are so filled with fury that you add Presence (minimum 0) to your damage.
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.sincarn: When not embodying a Sin, you reduce the DR of all Tests by -1. In addition, whenever you get better, roll for another Sin. At the beginning of each encounter, select one of your known Sins to embody.

content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.shoddyP: d6 damage with {amount} powder shots. Fumbles on a natural 1 or 2
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.shoddyC: d8 damage with {amount} powder shots. Fumbles on a natural 1 or 2
content.michaelmars.sinfulSailor.shoddyA: d10 damage with {amount} powder shots. Fumbles on a natural 1 or 2
